data.text: I had a stay room 520.it was a great and amazing stay. Everything was well arrange and groomed. The service and hospitality I have received beginning from the reception is amazing. I would like to have specially thank for miss Darshi who checked in on me. And thank you so much for the Concierge Ifran for my luggage assistance. Everything was perfect . Highly recommend for everything
data.title: Amazing hospitality

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Saleh,

Warm greetings from Mövenpick Hotel Apartments Al Mamzar Dubai.
I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.
I truly appreciate your kind words about our team members. It's definitely a boost for us every time we hear positive reviews such as this. We will Front office and concierge team know that they  made an impact during your stay.
Thank you once again for your wonderful review. We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.
Yours Sincerely,
Damir Kartal
Cluster General Manager of Mövenpick Hotel Apartments Al Mamzar Dubai & Mövenpick Hotel & Apartments Bur Dubai
owner_response.author: Damir  Kartal

data.text: The people who cleaned our room ( Semanda and Qasim and Emta) did an amazing job! Everything was spotless and we always came back from a long day of exploring to a big smile on our faces because of how inviting our beds looked ! They never moved our things but always organised them. Very happy with the service.
data.title: AMAZING SERVICE

data.text:
An amazing hotel with an amazing staff.

I found the receptionist, Ablbdelatif, to be extremely helpful and I will certainly return.

We also enjoyed the food very much.

In addition, the location is convenient 

The pool area was also enjoyable and relaxing.
data.title: Amazing Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Warm greetings from Mövenpick Hotel Apartments Al Mamzar Dubai.
We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. 
We are pleased to read that you enjoyed the quality of rooms, services and the facilities as well as the location of the hotel. It is very motivational for all the team to receive such positive comments. 
Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.
Yours Sincerely,
Damir Kartal	
Cluster General Manager of Mövenpick Hotel Apartments Al Mamzar Dubai & Mövenpick Hotel & Apartments Bur Dubai
owner_response.author: Damir  Kartal

data.text:
Nice ambience, food is awsome (international cuisin), parking also available no hassle for search, and marvellous staff and corporative staff named mubeen, rashila and insaf and chef. I had iftar buffet and i like it.
strongly recommend 👌
data.title: Positive review

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr.Mukkarams,
Warm greetings from Mövenpick Hotel Apartments Al Mamzar Dubai.
Thank you for sharing your positive dining experience with us.  
We were happy to read that you thoroughly enjoyed the iftar  buffet and the excellent service by Food and beverage team at the Spices restaurant. We will certainly share your positive comments with the entire team.
Thank you and we look forward to hosting you again in the near future.
Yours Sincerely
Damir Kartal
Cluster General Manager of Mövenpick Hotel Apartments Al Mamzar Dubai & Mövenpick Hotel & Apartments Bur Dubai
owner_response.author: Damir  Kartal

data.text: Came here for Iftar with my family; the food was quite good! The spread of dishes contained a variety, so it was quite nice to experience overall. The hospitality of the staff definitely was appreciated! Special mention to Mubeen for the great service, as well. Thank you!
data.title: Iftar At Movenpick Hotel Apart.
